titles.title: See The Conqueror Mount In Triumph

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}See The Conqueror Mount In Triumph, See The King In Royal State Riding On The Clouds His Chariot To His Heavenly Palace Gate; Hark, The Choirs Of Angel-Voices Joyful Hallelujahs Sing, And The Portals High Are Lifted To Receive Their Heavenly King.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Who Is This That Comes In Glory, With The Trump Of Jubilee? Lord Of Battles, God Of Armies, He Has Gained The Victory; He Who On The Cross Did Suffer, He Who From The Grave Arose, He Has Vanquished Sin And Satan, He By Death Has Spoiled His Foes.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
v5
